sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_739db1e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ee5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>sn_old</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	//incoming token will be R7hFQftHg90JBUsZYViu5geg
	var JSON = new global.JSON();
	var auth = false;
	var responseText = '';
	//verify user has been allowed to get data to Slack
	//search for the user , domain, room 
	var x_8821_slack_user = new GlideRecord('x_8821_slack_user');
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('domain', request.queryParams.team_domain[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('room', request.queryParams.channel_name[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('slack_user',request.queryParams.user_name[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.query();
	if(x_8821_slack_user.next()){
		//authenticated
		auth = true;
	} else {
		//not authenticated
		responseText = 'You do not have rights to get information in Slack from ServiceNow\n';
		responseText += 'type /register in slack and it will give you instructions to Register.';
	}
	if (auth) {
		var text = request.queryParams.text.toString();
		//sn sys_user searchterm
		var textArr = text.split(' ');
		var table = textArr[0];
		/*var tables = [];
		//https://dev13941.service-now.com/sys_db_object_list.do?sysparm_query=sys_update_nameISNOTEMPTY%5Elabel%3Dincident
		var dbo = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		dbo.addQuery('label',table);
		dbo.addQuery('super_class','!=','e72810100f000200f37f4d9ce1050e20');//not application file
		dbo.addQuery('super_class','!=','1d19dc100f000200f37f4d9ce1050ee0');//not import set row
		dbo.addQuery('name','NOT LIKE','000');
		dbo.addQuery('name','NOT LIKE','_m2m_');			
		dbo.query();
		while(dbo.next()){
			tables.push(dbo.name.toString());
		}
		for(var t=0;t<tables.length;t++){*/
		
			var tableLength = table.length;
			var term = text.substring(tableLength, text.length).trim();//"sn table "		
			var table_gr = new GlideRecord(table);
			var query = table_gr.getDisplayName().toString() + 'LIKE' + term;
			table_gr.addEncodedQuery(query);
			table_gr.setLimit(10);
			table_gr.orderBy(table_gr.getDisplayName());
			table_gr.query();
			if(table_gr.hasNext()){
				while(table_gr.next()){
					responseText += '<https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/';
					responseText += table_gr.getLink() + '|'+table_gr[table_gr.getDisplayName()]+'>\n';
				}
			} else {
				responseText = 'No results found with a keyword of "' + term + '".\n';
				responseText += '<https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/';
				responseText += table + '_list.do?sysparm_query=' + encodeURI(table_gr.getEncodedQuery());
				responseText += '|' + query + '>'
			}
		//}
		
	}
	var returnObj = {
		//"response_type": "ephemeral",
		"response_type": "in_channel",
		"text": responseText
		//"text": JSON.encode(request.queryParams)
	};
	// implement resource here;
	response.setContentType('application/json');
	response.getStreamWriter().writeString(JSON.encode(returnObj));
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_8821_slack/slack/sn_old</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/sn_old</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-15 01:51:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>739db1e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ee5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>66</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sn_old</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Slack" source="x_8821_slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_739db1e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ee5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-15 16:03:50</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Slack">078df9a80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ecd</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_da6456600ff30200f37f4d9ce1050ee4
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>register</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var domain = request.queryParams.team_domain[0];
	var room = request.queryParams.channel_name[0];
	var slack_user = request.queryParams.user_name[0];
	var JSON = new global.JSON();
	var auth = false;
	var responseText = '';
	//verify user has been allowed to get data to Slack
	//search for the user , domain, room 
	var x_8821_slack_user = new GlideRecord('x_8821_slack_user');
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('domain', domain);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('room', room);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('slack_user', slack_user);
	x_8821_slack_user.query();
	if(x_8821_slack_user.hasNext()){
		//authenticated
		auth = true;
		responseText = 'This account is already registered in this channel for this account.';
	} else {
		
		var user = 'javascript:gs.getUserID()';
		//not authenticated
		responseText = 'Navigate to https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/';
		//responseText += 'nav_to.do?uri=x_8821_slack_user.do?sys_id=-1&sysparm_query=';
		responseText += 'x_8821_slack_user.do?sys_id=-1&sysparm_query=';
		responseText += 'domain='+domain + '^room='+room + '^slack_user='+ slack_user+ '^user='+ user + '\n';
		responseText += 'Create a record with these values;\n';
		responseText += 'User: The User you use in ServiceNow\n';
		responseText += 'Domain: ' + domain + '\n';
		responseText += 'Room: ' + room + '\n';
		responseText += 'Slack User: ' + slack_user;
	}
	if (auth) {
		responseText = 'Account already registered';
	}
	var returnObj = {
		"response_type": "ephemeral",
		//"response_type": "in_channel",
		"text": responseText
		//"text": JSON.encode(request.queryParams)
	};
	// implement resource here;
	response.setContentType('application/json');
	response.getStreamWriter().writeString(JSON.encode(returnObj));
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_8821_slack/slack/register</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/register</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-15 03:30:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>da6456600ff30200f37f4d9ce1050ee4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>register</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Slack" source="x_8821_slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_da6456600ff30200f37f4d9ce1050ee4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-15 04:01:46</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Slack">078df9a80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ecd</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_fix_a25a1a500fca1200f37f4d9ce1050ec6
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"><sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><before>false</before><description/><flush_cache>false</flush_cache><name>Create Commands</name><run_once>true</run_once><script><![CDATA[var commandsObj = {"records":
				   [
					   {
						   "table":"incident",
						   "script":"\/\/table = current.table.  The thing above this field.\r\n\/\/term = the thing the person typed after the command\r\n\/\/answer = you need to define answer, this is what will write to the room\r\nvar result = function(){\r\n\tvar returnStr = '';\r\n\tvar inc = new GlideRecord(table);\r\n\tinc.initialize();\r\n\tinc.opened_by = user.sys_id;\r\n\tinc.short_description = term + ' - ' + user.user_name;\r\n\tinc.caller_id = user.sys_id;\r\n\tinc.insert();\r\n\treturnStr += '<' + instance + inc.getLink() + '|' + inc.number.toString() + '>';\t\r\n\treturn returnStr;\r\n};\r\nanswer = result();",
						   "response_type":"in_channel",
						   "description":"Create a incident with the short description of the stuff following \/inc ",
						   "command":"inc"
					   },
					   {
						   "table":"sys_script_client",
						   "script":"\/\/You have access to the following things in this script\r\n\/\/table = current.table.  The thing above this field.\r\n\/\/term = the thing the person typed after the command\r\n\/\/answer = you need to define answer, this is what will write to the room\r\nvar gr = new GlideRecord(table);\r\ngr.addQuery('script','CONTAINS',term);\r\ngr.setLimit(20);\r\ngr.orderBy('name');\r\ngr.query();\r\nanswer += 'Found ' + gr.getRowCount() + ' results\\n';\r\nwhile(gr.next()){\r\n\tanswer += '<' + instance + gr.getLink() + '|' + gr.name + '>\\n';\r\n}",
						   "response_type":"ephemeral",
						   "description":"Get script includes with a name containing the term or the script containing the term.",
						   "command":"clientscripts"
					   },
					   {
						   "table":"sys_script_include",
						   "script":"\/\/You have access to the following things in this script\r\n\/\/table = current.table.  The thing above this field.\r\n\/\/term = the thing the person typed after the command\r\n\/\/answer = you need to define answer, this is what will write to the room\r\nvar result = function(){\r\n\tvar returnStr = '';\r\n\tvar si = new GlideRecord(table);\r\n\tsi.addEncodedQuery('nameLIKE'+term+'^ORscriptLIKE'+term);\r\n\tsi.orderBy('name');\r\n\treturnStr += '<' + instance + 'nav_to.do?uri=' + table + '_list.do?sysparm_query=' + si.getEncodedQuery() + ' |Searched for \"sn si ' + term + '\">\\n';\r\n\tsi.query();\r\n\twhile(si.next()){\r\n\t\treturnStr += '<' + instance + si.getLink() + '|' + si.api_name.toString() + '>\\n';\t\r\n\t}\r\n\treturn returnStr;\r\n};\r\nanswer = result();",
						   "response_type":"ephemeral",
						   "description":"Get script includes with a name containing the term or the script containing the term.",
						   "command":"si"
					   }
				   ]
				  };
var index;
var arr = commandsObj.records;
for(index = 0;index<arr.length;index = index + 1){
	var commandGR = new GlideRecord('x_8821_slack_commands');
	commandGR.initialize();
	for (var prop in arr[index]){
		commandGR[prop] = arr[index][prop];
	}
	commandGR.insert();
}
var endpoint = 'https://dev13941.service-now.com/x_8821_share_install.do?';
endpoint += 'url=' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com';
endpoint += '&app=' + 'slack1.1';
endpoint += '&by=' + gs.getUserName();
var sm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
sm.setBasicAuth("share_user","share");
sm.setEndpoint(endpoint);
sm.setHttpMethod("post");
var response = sm.execute();
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-03-05 05:52:21</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a25a1a500fca1200f37f4d9ce1050ec6</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Create Commands</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Slack" source="x_8821_slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_a25a1a500fca1200f37f4d9ce1050ec6</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-03-05 08:10:09</sys_updated_on><unloadable>false</unloadable></sys_script_fix></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_dfca51340fb70200f37f4d9ce1050e28
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="DELETE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_8821_slack.SlackCart</api_name><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Utility Scripts to make background ordering of catalog items easier.

Sample usage:

gs.include('Cart');

var cart = new Cart();
var item = cart.addItem('e2132865c0a8016500108d9cee411699');
cart.setVariable(item, 'phone', 'pat');
var rc = cart.placeOrder();
gs.print(rc.number);

To create a named cart:
var cart = new Cart("Cart 1");
...

To create a cart for a specific user:
var cart = new Cart(null, "62826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5df1");
...

To create a named cart for a specific user:
var cart = new Cart("Cart 1", "62826bf03710200044e0bfc8bcbe5df1");
...</description><name>SlackCart</name><script><![CDATA[gs.include("PrototypeServer");

var SlackCart = Class.create();

SlackCart.prototype = {
    /**
     * @param cartName - name to use when creating/retrieving a cart. If the name is not passed in
     *            (or if it's null/undefined) the default cart will be used
     * @param userID - sys_id of the user to use when creating/retrieving a cart. It's also the user
     *            that will be used as the openedBy user on the request when an order is placed. If
     *            the user is not passed in (or if it's null/undefined) current user will be used.
     */
    initialize: function(cartName, userID) {
        this.cartName = !cartName ? null : cartName;
        this.userID = !userID ? null : userID;

        this.cart = this.getSlackCart();
        this.clearSlackCart();
    },

    getSlackCart: function() {
        var cart = global.GlideappCart.getSlackCartForRhino(this.cartName, this.userID);
        return cart.getGlideRecord();
    },

    clearSlackCart: function() {
        var id = this.cart.sys_id;
        var kids = new GlideRecord('sc_cart_item');
        kids.addQuery('cart', id);
        kids.deleteMultiple();
    },
    
    deleteSlackCart: function() {
        var cart = global.GlideappCart.getSlackCartForRhino(this.cartName, this.userID);
        cart.empty();
    },

    addItem: function(itemID, quantity) {
        if (typeof (quantity) == 'undefined')
            quantity = 1;
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_cart_item');
        gr.initialize();
        gr.cart = this.cart.sys_id;
        gr.cat_item = itemID;
        gr.quantity = quantity;
        var rc = gr.insert();
        this.prepVariables(itemID, rc);
        return rc;
    },

    prepVariables: function(itemID, cart_id) {
        var ci = global.GlideappCatalogItem.get(itemID);
        var gr = ci.getStandaloneVariables();
		var seq = ci.getKeySequence();
        while (gr.next()) {
            var question = new global.GlideappQuestion(gr.sys_id);
            var variable = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
            variable.initialize();
            variable.value.setValue(question.getValue());
            variable.item_option_new = gr.sys_id;
            variable.cart_item = cart_id;
			for (var i = 0; i < seq.size(); i++) {
				if (seq.get(i) + "" == gr.sys_id + "")
		            variable.order = i + "";
			}
            variable.insert();
        }
    },

    setVariable: function(cartID, variable_name, value) {
        var variable = new GlideRecord('sc_item_option');
        variable.addQuery('cart_item', cartID);
        variable.addQuery('item_option_new', variable_name).addOrCondition('item_option_new.name', variable_name);
        variable.query();
        if (variable.next()) {
            variable.value.setValue(value);
            variable.update();
        }
    },

    placeOrder: function() {
        var req = new GlideappRequestNew();
        var rc = req.copyCart(this.cartName, this.userID);
        this.clearSlackCart();
        return rc;
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-15 17:56:51</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>dfca51340fb70200f37f4d9ce1050e28</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SlackCart</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Slack" source="x_8821_slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_dfca51340fb70200f37f4d9ce1050e28</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2015-11-15 18:05:31</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_3ef0057c0f770200f37f4d9ce1050e2c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>sn</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var returnObj = {
		response_type: "ephemeral",
		text: "declared"
	};
	var JSON = new global.JSON();
	var auth = false;
	var instance = 'https://' + gs.getProperty('instance_name') + '.service-now.com/';
	var responseText = '';
	var user = '';
	//verify user has been allowed to get data to Slack
	//search for the user , domain, room 
	var x_8821_slack_user = new GlideRecord('x_8821_slack_user');
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('domain', request.queryParams.team_domain[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('room', request.queryParams.channel_name[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.addQuery('slack_user',request.queryParams.user_name[0]);
	x_8821_slack_user.query();
	if(x_8821_slack_user.next()){
		//authenticated
		user = x_8821_slack_user.user;
		auth = true;
		returnObj.text = "authenticated";
	} else {
		//not authenticated
		responseText = 'You do not have rights to get information in Slack from ServiceNow\n';
		responseText += 'type /register in slack and it will give you instructions to Register.';
		returnObj.text = responseText;
	}
	if (auth) {
		var text = request.queryParams.text.toString();
		//sn sys_user searchterm
			
		var textArr = text.split(' ');
		var command = textArr[0];
		var commandLength = command.length;
		var term = text.substring(commandLength, text.length).trim();//"sn table ";
		var commands = new GlideRecord('x_8821_slack_commands');
		commands.addQuery('command', command);
		commands.query();
		if(commands.next()){
			try{
				var vars = {
					'term' : term,
					'table': commands.table,
					'answer' : responseText,
					'instance': instance,
					'user': user
				};
				var evaluator = new GlideScopedEvaluator(); 
				evaluator.evaluateScript(commands, 'script', vars);
				returnObj.text = evaluator.getVariable('answer');
				returnObj.response_type = commands.response_type.toString();
				if(returnObj.text.length === 0){
					returnObj.text = 'answer is empty\n';
					returnObj.text += instance + commands.getLink();
				}
			}catch(error){
				returnObj.text = error;
			}
			
		}
	}
	/*var returnObj = {
		"response_type": "ephemeral",
		//"response_type": "in_channel",
		"text": responseText
		//"text": JSON.encode(request.queryParams)
	};*/
	// implement resource here;
	response.setContentType('application/json');
	response.getStreamWriter().writeString(JSON.encode(returnObj));
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_8821_slack/slack/sn</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/sn</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>false</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin_SHARE_SHARE</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2015-11-15 16:04:02</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3ef0057c0f770200f37f4d9ce1050e2c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>sn</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Slack" source="x_8821_slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Slack">871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_3ef0057c0f770200f37f4d9ce1050e2c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin_SHARE</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2016-03-04 04:41:08</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Slack">078df9a80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ecd</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ui_page_192aa4800f861200f37f4d9ce1050e3a
sys_update_xml.payload:
generaltruex_8821_slack_Instructions.do

To set up this slack command line integrations the following steps need to be taken;

  1. You have to add two commands to the room you'd like;
    1. Register
      1. https://?.service-now.com/api/x_8821_slack/slack/register
    2. SN
      1. https://?.service-now.com/api/x_8821_slack/slack/sn
  2. Once those are added, then from the room, you need to register with your new command.
    1. type your command you defined for register, probably /register
    2. that will give youa link to your instnace. This is how i verify the right people have access. This is so I dont haveto store anything more than usernames and slack names. That record it linked you to needs to be created so save it.
    3. Now you can do any commands you have defined with the command call /sn action term
]]>Instructionssys_ui_pageadmin_SHARE2016-03-04 02:50:27true192aa4800f861200f37f4d9ce1050e3a1Instructions871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6false871d31e80fb30200f37f4d9ce1050ef6sys_ui_page_192aa4800f861200f37f4d9ce1050e3aadmin_SHARE2016-03-04 04:37:43
